Record.ClassificationPath: Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Physiological Effects of Drugs/Reproductive Control Agents/Contraceptive Agents/Contraceptive Agents, Female/Contraceptives, Postcoital
Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Therapeutic Uses/Reproductive Control Agents/Contraceptive Agents/Contraceptive Agents, Female/Contraceptives, Postcoital
Record.Description: Contraceptive substances to be used after COITUS. These agents include high doses of estrogenic drugs; progesterone-receptor blockers; ANTIMETABOLITES; ALKALOIDS, and PROSTAGLANDINS.High doses of contraceptive substances that can be taken before, the morning after, or up to five days after the unprotected vaginal intercourse.
